name: They Hatched
description:
In a world in ruins,little humans remains. And you have come here searching for the lore that scaped out of the game, just as the bunch of eggs your life depends on. Take the role of the farmer, whose brain doesnt seem to work properly just because of the way he stands, and raid the dungeon in search of your drakelings, as they also force their way into battle, they become more of a risk than even your own enemies. Will you survive the chaos of your own job? will the constant rain of fire destroy the little control you have? come and see.

Created by Arturony  and Venezolane
